title: Self-Regulated E-Feedback-Based Mathematical Project Learning Design for Multicultural University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Math problem-solving competency enhancement program combining self-regulated learning strategies and feedback systems in e-learning, targeting multicultural working students

learning_goals: Establish weekly project plans with over 80% accuracy using e-feedback tools
Apply self-regulated learning strategies to improve deep approach ratios by over 40% during project assignments
Improve team project collaboration efficiency by over 30% based on culturally informed feedback
Achieve over 70% of project deliverable and report evaluation criteria in final comprehensive assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
